Name: Threat Mitigation Policy for Unexpected Privilege Escalation
Policy: ?Equipment ssso:hasService ?svc.                    ?svc rdf:type ssso:Share_Data.                    BIND (?svc AS ?Disable).                    BIND (ssso:TL-1 AS ?Threat_Level).
Description: Disable share data service on the device, Mitigated Threat Level is TL-1
